strapiPost.title: Advanced Technology Companies Choosing To Land in Arkansas
strapiPost.content:
With drone deliveries, self-driving vehicles, and electric modes of transportation, Northwest Arkansas is captaining the voyage of the future, acting as a hub for its realization. 

  • By sky: Walmart has partnered with Drone Up and Zipline for drone deliveries in NWA, and operations are up and running in select areas. Arkansas is ripe for the advancement of technologies and international companies are becoming aware of it. 
  • Friendly: Envirotech Vehicles, a zero-emission electric vehicle manufacturing company headquartered in California, has announced it will open its first U.S.-based manufacturing facility in Arkansas. The specific location and more information are to be announced at a later date. 

For more information, click HERE.
